title: Will I be eligible for ISAs ?
content:
I'm a 2022 fresher and I'm struck with severe fever for the past 4 days. My attendance in 4 subjects is below 85%.Although I have a prescription from the PESU Boys Hostel Doctor. Will they allow me to sit for ISAs?

Thank You.

comments.body: Don't worry, there's no minimum attendance requirement for ISA. Its only for the final ESA which you will be writing. Also I think that they've reduced the minimum attendance to 80%. Its fine if your attendance is a bit below what they tell you (around 75 should be fine) , but keep it above the minimum just to be safe because you never know when they might decide to be strict and actually enforce it on you. Good luck and get well soon!

the isa's are all fine. you need 85% for the esa's only. having a mandate on 85% where there are only 15 or so classes totally is totally senseless.

edit: hope your okay now
